cyberpunk-characters.name: V
cyberpunk-characters.quote: V. Just V. Only people who know me real well can use my real name.

cyberpunk-characters.name: Johnny Silverhand
cyberpunk-characters.quote: They call me Johnny Silverhand. Maybe you've heard of me.
cyberpunk-characters.rol: Former rebel and rock legend turned digital ghost in the world of Cyberpunk 2077.
cyberpunk-characters.afiliated: Formerly affiliated with the band Samurai and leader of the resistance against mega-corporations.

cyberpunk-characters.name: Panam Palmer
cyberpunk-characters.quote: I know it's a damn cliche, but sometimes you just gotta close your eyes and gun it.
cyberpunk-characters.rol: Nomad and skilled mechanic known for her daring spirit and expertise with vehicles.
cyberpunk-characters.afiliated: Part of the Aldecaldos clan, a group of nomads roaming the Badlands.

cyberpunk-characters.name: Judy Alvarez
cyberpunk-characters.quote: In Night City, you can be anyone. Anything. And everything's possible.
cyberpunk-characters.rol: Braindance technician and empathetic soul with a deep connection to Night City's underbelly.
cyberpunk-characters.afiliated: Works at Lizzie's Bar and occasionally assists the Voodoo Boys gang.

cyberpunk-villiains.name: Adam Smasher
cyberpunk-villiains.quote: In the end, we all serve the corporation.
cyberpunk-villiains.rol: Cyber-enhanced enforcer and ruthless loyalist to the mega-corporations.
cyberpunk-villiains.afiliated: Serves as a prime agent for Arasaka Corporation's interests.

cyberpunk-villiains.name: Royce
cyberpunk-villiains.quote: Rules are for suckers. We make our own rules in this city.
cyberpunk-villiains.rol: Gang leader and black-market kingpin with a penchant for chaos.
cyberpunk-villiains.afiliated: Leads the Maelstrom gang, notorious for cyber-implant thefts and violence.

cyberpunk-villiains.name: Saburo Arasaka
cyberpunk-villiains.quote: Power is not given. It is taken.
cyberpunk-villiains.rol: Elderly yet cunning CEO of Arasaka Corporation, wielding immense influence.
cyberpunk-villiains.afiliated: Head of the Arasaka dynasty, a megacorporation with a ruthless reputation.
